meanings.definition: The act of giving assistance or support.
meanings.sent1: She offered a helping hand to her friend in need.
meanings.sent2: The firefighter provided a helping to the trapped cat.
meanings.sent3: The helping from the kind stranger made the lost child smile.
meanings.sent4: Her helping was like a warm hug on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The helping of the nurse was like a ray of sunshine in the hospital.

meanings.definition: A portion of food served to someone at a meal.
meanings.sent1: He asked for a second helping of mashed potatoes.
meanings.sent2: The host offered a helping of dessert to each guest.
meanings.sent3: The helping of spaghetti was so big, it filled the plate.
meanings.sent4: Her helping of cake was as sweet as her smile.
meanings.sent5: The helping of soup warmed him up on the chilly evening.

meanings.sent1: The waiter brought another helping of rice to the table.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed a helping of salad with her lunch.
meanings.sent3: The helping of fruit was a refreshing end to the meal.
meanings.sent4: His helping of steak was cooked to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The helping of ice cream melted quickly in the summer heat.
